meta.title: me:translate
meta.desc: A command to translate a message.

sections.section: Use like `me:translate ja Hello!`. The first arg is 2-letters language code and the second is the text. **NOTE: You need not quote the text.**
This bot supports react-to-translate. To use it, react with a country flag. Example: US, UK, Canada: English China: Simplified Chinese Taiwan, Hong Kong: Traditional Chinese Japan: Japanese
